website_summaries.verdict: This entry-level set is a bargain for those who want enough flatware for a dinner party on a budget. The value per dollar is the best available.
pros: Simple, elegant design with a good weight
Includes steak knives and a host of serving pieces
cons: Some owner complaints about the butter knife and steak knife handles being too thin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and weight for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and weight for the price. I would have given it five stars but the steak knives are wimpy. Also the packaging was sooooo annoying. Every. Single. Piece. was individually wrapped in plastic. Except the five pieces that were tie wrapped for display. It legit took 30+ minutes to unpack it all. Lame!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: Mom are these disposable?
customer_reviews.text: Needed a set of everyday utensils. Went with Pfaltzgraff since it’s a good brand, my dishes and serving plates are from them. I would never gift these utensils, my teenagers asked if they were disposable utensils. I’m keeping them only b/c I opened everything & washed hmthrm before realtthe poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: LadyBug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these and the weight! They do rust a bit if you don't dry them right away, but that's easily avoided. My only issue with them was the steak knives were cheaply made, and the numbers were uneven. I got too many forks and was missing 1 small spoon. Otherwise, they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Ogletree

customer_reviews.title: I am giving a one star rating based on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am giving a one star rating based on the quality of this product. I was trying to match a set I bought from Costco. The Pfaltzgraff brand was similar, but the quality was not the same. The pieces were much lighter. Also, when I opened the box all of the spoons were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: This was also a gift and I am sure she will enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: The company they were made by caught my attention. They make quality products and I am sure my friend will enjoy using this set.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Hester

customer_reviews.title: Too skimpy
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected for $100. Way too thin and light. Resembled the stuff we used to use at the school cafeteria.
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyBeagle

customer_reviews.title: Great product, stylish and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great set, I purchased one last year & decided to purchase another. Very good quality and it’s simple design makes it compatible with all design styles.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Merr
customer_reviews.text: The review said there aren't watermarks. The ad said "Never needs polishing" and is "Dishwater Safe". My flatware came out with multiple spots on every one of them. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Merrily R. Snider

customer_reviews.title: flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected from the Pfaltzgraff name, though the price was low. They're so thin and bend just trying to eat ice cream. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Had these for years
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for years, no complaints. The steak knives that come with them are decent, although not the highest quality they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The flatware is thinner and lighter than I was expecting. The finish is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Jim Butler

customer_reviews.title: Almost happy with set.
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that the forks should be adjusted for size difference. Its barely noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: S. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Nice.  Could be heavier.
customer_reviews.text: They were a great deal. I just wish they were a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Need more serving spoons. Iced tea spoons would be better than the 2 sizes of table spoons. Wish there were actual dessert sized forks. Knives starting to tarnish/rust? But still would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Set!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a gift for my aunt and she loved the set!! They were a bit thinner than I expected... Good for the weight if you are looking for light weight!! They shipped here very quickly! My aunt especially liked that the steak knives were included!! If she is happy... I’m thrilled!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of silverware for the price. Sturdy and the simple design makes them easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would feel more substantial when holding them in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Saxton

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rusted in less than 3 washes. Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: CHELE

customer_reviews.title: Quality Flatware
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order of these. I'm a little disappointed, because the size doesn't match the originals. They're much longer and somewhat wider. Still the great quality, though.
customer_reviews.author: putwoman

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT COME WITH THE CORRECT PIECES IN THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed the set was suppose to have 8 large dinner forks and 8 salad forks.What came in the package was 15 salad forks and 1 dinner fork. This is a nice set, I am just upset I DID NOT GET WHAT I WAS SUPPOSE TO GET IN THE BOX .
customer_reviews.author: Rhoop

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots on knife
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the product. I’ve only use the silverware for about two months and one of the knives already has rust spots. I would not of expected this from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: I got this to replace a housewarming gift that was ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace a housewarming gift that was totally not my taste-and showed water spots something awful. This doesn't and it is more ergonomical. Also came with 8 steak knives not mentioned in description.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dann

customer_reviews.title: Looked good and arrived in time and as described
customer_reviews.text: This was an adopt a family gift, so I can only comment on that the transaction was great, arrived as promised and item was as described.
customer_reviews.author: JLMV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they are bit lighter than what I am use to, but love the country look.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn B.

customer_reviews.title: Bendy
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but would bend very easily, was mashing my granddaughters potato on her plate, I feel they would bend if pressed too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie AUker-Howlett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Great for parties. Look nice and are of good quality. Sturdy and don't break.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected, some sharp edges on the spoons and forks. Does not feel good in the hand....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought same set few years ago and had lost a few.so glad to find same pattern again.old set still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: LLW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of silverware
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a couple that will be heading overseas and needed to get some items for their new home away from home.
customer_reviews.author: Bard

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: this is a great set for every day use. Looks good and cleans up nice in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Delong

customer_reviews.title: 100% perfect wedding gift.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product I gave as a wedding gift! I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: A. sheridan

customer_reviews.title: quality is okay. feels very light in your hands ...
customer_reviews.text: quality is okay. feels very light in your hands. edges of spoons are smooth, no nicks or sharp spots missed during mfg. ideal for college apartment, or starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Bubs

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap silverware.
customer_reviews.text: Decent cheap silverware. Good enough for a secondary set of silverware. Don't expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: A. Saulnier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality silverware
customer_reviews.text: I love the silverware. It is good quality and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Tauer

customer_reviews.title: It's silverware, kinda plain but it will put food ...
customer_reviews.text: It's silverware,kinda plain but it will put food in your mouth!☺☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set
customer_reviews.text: I picked these up for nearly 80% off retail price, and it's a really nice set. Comes with a bunch of extra pieces, some you may, or may not use.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: College set up
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the set. Perfect for my son's first apartment.
customer_reviews.author: lisahq

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift is loved
customer_reviews.text: Very nice flatware, bought this as a wedding gift, they loved it
customer_reviews.author: Debi Rose

customer_reviews.title: beware.. they looked great in the package but
customer_reviews.text: because after i washed them , they rusted!!! I read another review & a lady said the same thig happened to her!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kornblum

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if we will like handling that large of knives
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used them yet but the pieces are very large. Not sure if we will like handling that large of knives, forks.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Feels pretty cheap. Works but barely a step up from ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels pretty cheap. Works but barely a step up from the dollar store to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: ShuMO

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are not to lite and not to heavy.they have been thur the dish washer several times and clean very well
customer_reviews.author: Kasi Savolt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are huge pieces, I might have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Siener

customer_reviews.title: It is terrible, since about the 3 month mark we have ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this silverware for a little over a year. It is terrible, since about the 3 month mark we have been seeing rust. Not good!
customer_reviews.author: Orvis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 sets of these and they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set. Hope I can get another. I run out of spoons frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great look, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set!! Also bought a 20 piece set to supplement.
customer_reviews.author: vicki8seekers

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but flimsy feeling... These are not high quality steel.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey M

customer_reviews.title: So so, per pictures on the website
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but not like the set I bought last year
customer_reviews.author: lee man.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Not too heavy but not too light. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Donley

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps it is my dishwasher, but some spots (not ...
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it is my dishwasher, but some spots (not water spots) were left on product. Otherwise just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Mary cox

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift but liked design and many pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Spicuzza

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. Bent tines on forks within 2 weeks. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kehoe

customer_reviews.title: wrong spoons
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to have 8 teaspoons and 8 tablespoons. they sent me 1 teaspoon and 15 tablespoons. Tablespoons are too big for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter set
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality... one solid step above coffee shop stuff You would have to double the price (almost) to get any better
customer_reviews.author: J Reece

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - low quality, costly return policy
customer_reviews.text: These are worthy of a fancy family reunion and that is all. Price should have made that obvious but many of these reviews are overly favorable. Granting 2 stars because they are functional and shipped well. Pfaltzgraff used to be the household name for quality cutlery. No more. Beware of return policies...i included this item among 4 items I wanted the next day. I am now paying an additional $9 to ship these back whereas most items you can return and send back at no charge. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Sticher

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handles weren't as heavy as I would have liked but overall they are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R.

customer_reviews.title: good bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: perfect for transporting food from serving surface (be it a plate, bowl, or trough). The fit into the facial orifice with a sufficient payload to justify energy expended lifting the utensil and the smooth finish allows for a clean deposit. When service completed, they go through the dishwasher, unscathed, and back into the drawer for another culinary adventure. Nice style, well balanced in the hand and a very fair price. What more can you ask of flatware!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Killebrew

customer_reviews.title: Was really nice and transaction easy - it was a gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was really nice and transaction easy - it was a gift and the recipient had already purchased a flatware set was the only reason I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ashuddleston

customer_reviews.title: Already rusting in less than a week...
customer_reviews.text: Already starting to rust and I haven't even had them for more than a week. In good faith I can't give this set my approval.
customer_reviews.author: Rp

customer_reviews.title: Corrosion problem
customer_reviews.text: The dinner knives, three of them, showed rusting/corrosion after one washing in a dishwasher. Corrosion was on the handles and on the serrations on the blade. This is not good quality stainless steel. I am returning them to Amazon. Pfaltzgraff should not put its good name on such inferior flatware. I recommend against buying them.
customer_reviews.author: JPC

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected from Pfaltzgraff
customer_reviews.text: The set I received had so many defective pieces that I had to return it. It’s thin and very poor workmanship. I ended up getting an Oneida set instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: It's garbage. Now that I can see that it rusted ...
customer_reviews.text: It's garbage. Now that I can see that it rusted after TWO dishwashing cycles, I can wholeheartedly say it's overpriced!!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan N.

customer_reviews.title: Good price but not real sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product was $6 more expensive in home store so I figured I would buy it through Amazon. The silverware looks nice but... it bends easily when getting ice cream and even the knives are not that heavy. Will be looking for more sturdy silverware in the future. I recommend keeping your old silverware for a bit until you figure out if you really like this set. Wish I would have done that!!
customer_reviews.author: Firedog

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, so cheap feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, as I love the style. However, once I opened the package, I could not believe how thin the utensils were. They were more like cheap diner flatware than I really expected from Pfaltzgraff. I was going to replace my aging set, but at this point I'll keep the old set, and only use the Pfaltzgraff for company, or when I need more than what I already have.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super nice!
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. It's perfect if you're looking for a quality, minimalist set of silverware that go with just about anything. They're extremely light, so they won't be doing everything in their power to fall off your plate, and don't feel flimsy or bendable. The photos make it look like they have a brushed nickel texture, but they have more of a mirror finish to them. These are great! You won't be disappointed, and they're very well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Merskin

customer_reviews.title: Still a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy, everyday cutlery. However, the stainless steel alloy mixt5ure is of poor quality, and some of the pieces, especially the dinner knives, show rust spots even after one wash. Although this product has been appropriately priced, it should really6 be advertised as seconds. No way the stainless steel used in these utensils passed a Quality Control inspection. Nevertheless, this is still a bargain
customer_reviews.author: jparker921

customer_reviews.title: I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this nearly two months ago and was a little worried about the claims of rusting in a matter of a couple weeks. I've no signs of rust as of yet. They are just what I want for everyday use. Complete with serving untensils and serrated steak knives, I have no complaints. With a family of 6, I just may buy a second set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: So chuffed with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable set of cutlery to use everyday and these fit the bill and then some. Pros: Amazing quality, dishwasher safe, lifetime warranty, number in set, serving pieces included, simple yet beautiful. Cons: None that I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Use them for every day meals. Nice heft (weight) to them. No adverse results from dishwasher every day. The set includes a slotted serving spoon (love that!), an extra large serving spoon, a butter knife ... excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my new flatware
customer_reviews.text: I love my new flatware! It arrived a day early and when I finally got around to opening the box I was really impressed by the quality and shine. These are really nice looking and seem very sturdy. I liked them so much I also ordered the 20 piece set so that I have flatware for 12 people for holidays and parties.
customer_reviews.author: janeta

customer_reviews.title: ... took a while for me to post but I love this set
customer_reviews.text: it took a while for me to post but I love this set. It is durable and looks as new as it did when i purchased this about 6 months ago. The price is also great. I do wish they had added more serving spoons.
customer_reviews.author: Yopayo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I chose this because first, I like the simple design, and second I loved the price. What's not shown on the image is that there are serving-style pieces included, and eight steak knives. The utensils are nicely weighted, too. I would highly recommend without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: The Lizzie Bennett

customer_reviews.title: High end and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love that you get steak knifes too. This is a simple timeless pattern
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The finish isn't as thick as I would like (Don't scrub too hard with an abrasive cleaner or ...
customer_reviews.text: The finish isn't as thick as I would like (Don't scrub too hard with an abrasive cleaner or pad), but they look great and work well for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Simpson

customer_reviews.title: but very nice looking simple design - exactly what I expected and ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit lightweight compared to some, but very nice looking simple design - exactly what I expected and they were packaged well. A bonus that steak knives were included at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Arn, 42Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this silverware. Very strong, weighty, and durable. Every single piece feels good in your hand. Beautiful in its simplicity and function. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DaletheDruid

customer_reviews.title: perfect set to replace old silverware
customer_reviews.text: threw out all my old silverware when we moved -- this set was perfect came with everything I needed. Plus it's Pfalzgraff -- can't beat the quality and simple style. love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Leal

customer_reviews.title: They work great.
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for a little while now, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Haliey

customer_reviews.title: I have an older set of this product and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an older set of this product and was very excited to find the same maker and design too match my old set......However, I should've realized that new products are not as durable, heavy or worth the price. sorry but I have to rate this very low
customer_reviews.author: SLJ

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. I didn't expect that disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they'd be thicker, heavier, and better quality than they are. Only because they have the Pfaltzgraff name on them, which I thought meant quality. I guess I should have known by the price, but hey, sometimes you find a gem of a bargain. This is not it. The photos make the pieces look thicker and heavier than they are, as well as give them a more satin look than they have. I have only had them a week, and haven't seen any rust yet, but if I do I'll be back to lower my rating to 1 star. For now, these are just another run of the mill cheap set of silverware.
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. There were small scratches on the serving ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. There were small scratches on the serving ware but I believe they would have replaced it for me had I asked them too. They are great to work with. It was so minute it wasn't worth the hassle to me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Think everlasting. Bold and serviceable.
customer_reviews.text: Great brand. I hand washed the 53 piece set service for eight early one morning. The weight of each piece was uniform and definitely something to be proud of for years to come. Simply classic with purpose.
customer_reviews.author: rdavidsf

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 to have a serving for 16. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 to have a serving for 16. The simple design is pleasing while there is enough mass to define the quality in each utensil.
customer_reviews.author: Winston Getz

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday flatware
customer_reviews.text: Good generic everyday flatware. The price was excellent. Flatware seems to disappear at my home, so this was an ideal set because of the low price. Quality is great considering the price. I will probably buy this item again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lafayette bone doc

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this flatware
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this flatware. I have had many sets over the years and this one is by far my favorite. Price is fantastic too. I wasn't expecting it to be this high in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: A winner! The young couple that we gave this too seems really happy with the quality and design for and everyday table service
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for a vacation rental
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy product looks better in the photos. Other reviews were correct.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great for the everyday!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these sets and it's great to use for the everyday! The small fork is still a bit large still but it's a wonderful set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burleson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected: quality, look. received quickly, reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Navigatethewinds/Marie

customer_reviews.title: They are very pretty though.
customer_reviews.text: wish they were not quite so shiny. We're forever buffing them! They are very pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Silverware
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter for Christmas. Her only request was that they be heavy. I thought these looked heavy and when they came, the box was certainly heavy, but when unpacked, they were pretty thin and light. The style is pretty and simple. I think the quality is good if you are looking for a lighter set. There were more pieces to the set than I expected. Maybe I didn't read the description well enough, but I wasn't expecting all the extras. My daughter liked them in spite of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Scriver

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price I was hoping for them to feel better quality
customer_reviews.author: DAN

customer_reviews.title: Not much substance but ok
customer_reviews.text: A little light. Not airplane meal light but not very substantial either
customer_reviews.author: Ephraim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We have it for a yr now and it looks fresh, we hand and dishwasher it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly like the ones I grew up with. My wife loves the set. We are upgrading from a cheap set, and these will easily last for ages. They are sturdy and presentable. They feel nice in the hand. The only complaint so far is the weight on the handle. The cheap set had no weight on the handle, so balancing the silverware (such as on top of a cup) was easy. With these, the head is lighter than the stem. Don't balance them, lay them down. Further, they won't slide to the slightest bump.
customer_reviews.author: AlbertS

customer_reviews.title: Nice entry level silverware set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set to put in our camper. The quality is nice and durable and cleans up easily after each use
customer_reviews.author: dogpile

customer_reviews.title: flatware
customer_reviews.text: the flatware was for my son and it is fine for everyday use...not very heavy but will work for everyday use...
customer_reviews.author: mary ann sexton

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift to a family member and they love the look and selection
customer_reviews.text: This was sent as a gift to a family member and they love the look and selection. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Howard Foster

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased, it's a nice set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased, it's a nice set for the price:) Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: WishingLane

product_meta.title: Pfaltzgraff Everyday Simplicity 53-Piece Stainless Steel Flatware Set, Service for 8
product_meta.description: Size:53-Piece SetThis Pfaltzgraff Everyday Simplicity Flatware Set has graceful styling, making it perfect for any occasion. Quality crafted of 18/0 stainless steel, this set will stand up to the rigors of everyday use. 53 Piece Set, service for eight, includes (8) each: dinner fork, salad fork, dinner knife, dinner spoon, teaspoon and steak knives, plus a 5 piece Hostess Set, which includes (1) each of: tablespoon, pierced tablespoon, cold meat fork, sugar spoon and butter knife. Dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: 53-PIECES OF FLATWARE INCLUDED: This 53-piece flatware set, service for eight, includes (8) of each: dinner fork, salad fork, dinner knife, dinner spoon, teaspoon, and steak knife
HOSTESS SERVING UTENSILS: This set also features a 5-piece Hostess Set, which includes (1) each of: tablespoon, pierced tablespoon, cold meat fork, sugar spoon and butter knife
QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL: This flatware is crafted of superior quality 18/0 stainless steel, this set will stand up to the rigors of everyday use
NO POLISHING NEEDED: This flatware never needs to be polished, making care and maintenance easy
DISHWASHER SAFE: This flatware is dishwasher safe, making clean up easy and convenient

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars296 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
